title: Smeagol, Slippery Sneak (8R27)
text:
Set:	Siege of Gondor
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gollum
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Companion
Strength:	3
Vitality:	4
Resistance:	6
Signet:	Frodo
Game Text:	Ring-bound. To play, add a burden. Skirmish: Add threats equal to the total vitality of the minions Smeagol is skirmishing to discard Smeagol. Regroup: Discard Smeagol to take a [Gollum] minion from your discard pile into hand.
Rarity:	R
